title: Firecracker Jinx
body:
I go on League of Legends and see all the Lunar Revel stuff and hope that the stars have finally aligned and I can finally get my Firecracker Jinx skin. To my surprise, out of the 3 new skins, it's the only one that's 1350. Very disappointed, I buy it and then a few hours later, a friend tells me it's 975? 
Is it possible to be refunded so I can repurchase Firecracker Jinx for the amount it was intended to be on release?

replies.body: That was a slip-up on Riot's end. If you make a support ticket (and screenshot proof that you brought the skin at that price) then I'm sure that you'll get your RP back.
